title: Abandoned Love
description: "She's my mommy. Mine. You don't have a mommy," Delilah Love was cruelly told when she was only four. After that bombshell, she lived in numerous foster homes where she never felt loved or wanted. Starving for love and affection, she began to believe in someone who kept professing his love to her daily, and the results almost ended up costing her her life, leaving her devastated and more insecure than ever. As a dedicated nurse, Delilah never socialized or dated anyone. However, through pleading and coaxing by her only friend and roommate, Janet Green, she did agree to attend a party with her. Grant Sanders was instantly enchanted by Delilah's beauty. He thought that she was magnetic. She looked like an angel with her long wavy blonde hair, and she was the most beautiful woman he had ever seen. He just could not take his eyes off her. In one glance, Grant's beautiful big brown eyes captivated Delilah. Realizing how head over heels in love she was with Grant, her insecurities emerge. How long will it be before he betrays her?
author: Ida Plassay
